name: Guitar Runner
description:
Get ready to rock in this exciting infinite runner game! In "Guitar Runner", you play as a pick on a guitar, jumping up and down the strings to collect good notes and avoid evil notes and chords. The game is synced with the audio beat, so make sure to stay in rhythm!

As you progress, you'll get power-ups like shields, which grant you immunity to damage for a set amount of time, and detaches, which remove all the evil notes on a string. You'll also find score boosts and health pickups to keep you going.

The gameplay is simple to pick up, but challenging to master. Use your reflexes and strategy to navigate through the strings and survive as long as possible. Can you beat your high score and become a true guitar hero?

With colorful graphics and catchy music, "Guitar Runner" is the perfect game for music lovers and fans of infinite runners. So grab your pick and start strumming your way to victory!
